title: Victor Ringhouse
content:
Victor William Ringhouse, 93, of Hamilton, Ill. died Sunday, Sept. 6, 2015 at the Montebello Health Care Center in Hamilton. 
  
He was born on May 27, 1922 in Sutter, Ill., a son of William Martin and Pauline Anna Meyer Ringhouse. Victor married Aera F. Batley in the Little Brown Church in the Vale at Nashua, on Nov. 2, 1946. She preceded him in death on July 9, 2004. 
      
He is survived by two daughters, including Rita (Robert) Coyle of Hamilton, Ill.; five grandchildren and 12 great grandchildren. 
 
He was preceded in death by his parents and wife. 
 
A private Graveside will be held on Friday, Sept. 11, at 11:30 a.m. at Oakwood Cemetery in Hamilton, Illinois with Pastor Bob Wagner officiating. 
 
Visitation will be held on Thursday, Sept. 10, 4-7 p.m. at the Lamporte - St. Clair Funeral Home of Hamilton. 
 
Memorials have been established for Bethel Presbyterian Church of Hamilton. Condolences may be left for the family at www.lamportefuneralhomes.com 
 
Lamporte - St. Clair Funeral Home of Hamilton is in charge of arrangements.
